item.title: ::roll command error
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Essentially in most ‘frameworks’ floating around, there’s an array of player entities. Each player entity is obviously an instance of the Player class; thus, containing the method sendMessage(String). One would iterate through that array calling sendMessage(aString) to send a message to all player entities within the array (all players).

So, in your case you wish to send a message to all players with the number rolled and the roller’s name. You’d do this by doing the above and having aString equal rollerName + " rolled a " + rolledNumber.

I cannot break it down any simpler than that.

Read full topic

item.title: ::roll command error
item.dc:creator: @deadrose91 deadrose91
item.description:
@deadrose91 wrote:

ok moparscape im using mithscape 508 source and heres my problem, i made a ::roll command, for a gambel option of whatever, so heres my code at the moment

else if (cmd[0].equals(“roll”)) {
int message = Misc.random(1);//Made by Aaron (co-owner of Dynasty PKz)
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “<img=1>”+Misc.optimizeText(p.username)+" has rolled a 1");
}

so when i hit the command ::roll i want it to shoutout whoever did the commands number he or she rolled and what its doing is just showing it in the text bar im wanting it to either shout out or yell like the ::yell command.

if u have any idea what the problem is please tell me ill even rep ya lol

Read full topic
